text:
BEIJING (Reuters) - China will open up more sectors of the economy to foreign investors, and its policy of protecting foreign companies’ rights in the country will not change, Vice Commerce Minister Wang Shouwen said on Sunday.

Reporting by Kevin Yao and Ryan Woo; Writing by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Kim Coghill
article title: China says will open more sectors of economy to foreign investors

meta information.meta description: China will open up more sectors of the economy to foreign investors, and its policy of protecting foreign companies' rights in the country will not change, Vice Commerce Minister Wang Shouwen said on Sunday.
